full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHYI NANG GZHAN GSUM GSAL BAR BYED PA DRI MED 'OD KYI RGYAN CES BYA BA MKHAS GRUB NOR BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @419B (ZHES PHYI NANG GZHAN GSUM GYI DON GSAL BAR BYED PA DRI MED 'OD KYI RGYAN CES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA MCHOG TU ,GCES SPRAS SU MDZAD PA'I, CHOS RGYAL CHEN PO, ,NANG SO RDO RJE TSE BRTAN PA'I BKA' STZAL DANG DU BLANGS TE, BKA' DANG BSTAN BCOS 'GYUR RO 'TSAL GYI BANG MDZOD, RI BO BDE CHEN CHOS KYI PHO BRANG DU DBU BTZUGS TE, BKRA SHIS STENG KHA ZHES BYA BA'I RI KHROD DU BYA BA BTANG BA NOR BZANG RGYA MTSOS RDZOGS PAR SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO BYED NUS PAR @420A *, ,GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,BHA WANTU, ,` SRID GSUM 'GRO BA KUN GYI SKYABS GNAS GCIG BU PA, RGYAL DBANG CHEN PO BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS, KHYOD KYIS GLEGS BAM 'DI'I RI MOR ZHUS DAG DGOS RIGS RNAMS KYIS GNANG BYUNG BAR, ZHUS DAG NAN TAN DU BGYIS PA'I YIG NOR PHRAN BU 'DUG PA RNAMS BCOS SHING, RI MO LHAG BCAS PHRAN BU 'JOG PA GNANG BA RNAMS LA ZHIB BRTZIS SU BGYIS TE MCHAN BU 'GA' ZHIG BDAG ZUG PO GZHON NU'I MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
author_simple: MKHAS GRUB NOR BZANG RGYA MTSO,
